title: LiloBee
author: LiloBee
created_time: November 21, 2022, 12:14:19 PMLast edit: November 21, 2022, 12:41:12 PM by LiloBee
content: Issued by Claybox Studios, The Noxal is a NFT Fi+ universe platform under Web3.0. The Noxal plans to release multiple NFTs collection those are tightly connected with on-chain games in the future, e-sports prediction systems, and ultilities for real life value. The DAO spirit of this community allows high flexibility on autonomy. Players can own various NFTs, participate in games, social, online sports prediction, online shopping, etc., to maximize use cases of NFTs, bringing blockchain mass adoption closer than ever.Bounty Campaign starts from  22nd November and will run 8 weekWeek 1: 22/11/2022 - 28/11/2022Week 2: 29/11/2022 - 05/12/2022Week 3: 06/12/2022 - 12/12/2022Week 4: 13/12/2022 - 19/12/2022Week 5: 20/12/2022 - 26/12/2022Week 6: 27/12/2022 - 02/01/2023Week 7: 03/01/2023 - 09/01/2023Week 8: 10/01/2023 - 16/01/2023Total Pool: 10,000$ worth of $OXA tokenDistribution: 1 Month After TGE Pool InformationTwitter campaign - 25%Telegram campaign - 25%Discord campaign - 10%Growth hacking campaign - 10%Article campaign - 20%YouTube campaign - 10%This Campaign will be managed by LBeeservice . To ask all the questions please join the Bounty group LBeeserviceGeneral Rules 1. Must join The Noxal Telegram Chat2. For any kind of bounty issue only ask in Bounty Group LBeeservice3. Must subscribe YouTube4. Every week you need to make a new post in the thread for weekly report submit, don’t edit and quote the previous post.5.  If you edit any previous post for report submitting your rewards will be Zero.6.  Don't complete any task just in one day. Do it by the whole week.7.  Using Multi-accounts, Spamming and Cheating are not allowed and will result in Disqualification from the Campaign.8.  Cheating Twitter Follower and Facebook Friends, using someone else to do the work and spamming or any kind of unethical behavior when participating to one of the campaigns are not allowed and will get you disqualified from all bounties.9. Submit the proof of authentication in the thread whatever campaign you are participating. It is a mandatory option.10. When bounty ends, you will have 7 days for any questions/complaints11. Making your own post must be unique and creative, useless and copy-paste posts are not allowed getting stakes12. Don’t discuss Bounty Related issue in Official Telegram Group  #PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username: Forum Profile Link: Telegram Username: Participated Campaigns: Solana Wallet Address: TWITTER CAMPAIGNRULES1. Follow The Noxal Twitter Account 2. Your Twitter account must have at least 500 real followers.3. Your Twitter audit score must be equal to at least 90% and only real followers from the last audit will count.4. Your weekly posts must be at least 30 characters long, and unique. If you are found out literally copy-pasting other users posts, you will not be awarded any stakes, be unique.5. Participant profile must be public.6. All tasks should be done Daily, using 1-4 days to complete tasks will result to no stake for the week. 7. Use this Hashtags on your Tweet and Retweet : $OXA #IDO #TheNoxal #WEB3 #PlayandEarn #NFTs #GameFi #PublicSale @thenoxal and Website link.REWARDS5 Valid Tweets, Retweets and likes per week = 5 Stakes/week8 Valid Tweets, Retweets and likes per week = 8 Stakes/week10 Valid Tweets, Retweets and likes per week = 10 Stakes/week       TELEGRAM CAMPAIGNRULES1. You Must join The Noxal TELEGRAM And TELEGRAM BOUNTY2. Add  “The Noxal Ambassador” to your Telegram username and Add Avatar3. Stay in the Telegram group until the Bounty is over.4. Anyone Posting Bounty Related issue in The The Noxal Official Group will be Disqualified From All campaign5. Promote The Noxal in other Telegram groups, but they need to be made in a constructive way, not in a way that might be considered spamming. Deleted messages won’t be counted.REWARDS1. Join Telegram Group = 1 Stake2. Add  “The Noxal Ambassador” to your Telegram username = 1 stake3. Using The Noxal Avatar in Telegram  = 1 Stakes4. Posting messages about The Noxal in your Telegram group or Others (minimum 1,000 members)( Use Project Telegram handle and website link) : 1 stakes per approved post5. Actively Discuss on main Telegram about their Recent tropic( Don’t use hashtag on post and try to make conversation): 1 stakes per approved post6. Make 2 Post on main group and Maximum 5 post on others group Per Week.       DISCORD CAMPAIGNRULES1. You Must join The Noxal DISCORD SERVER2. Stay in the DISCORD SERVER until the Bounty is over.3. Anyone Posting Bounty Related issue in The The Noxal DISCORD SERVER will be Disqualified From All campaign4. Promote The Noxal in other DISCORD SERVER, but they need to be made in a constructive way, not in a way that might be considered spamming. Deleted messages won’t be counted.REWARDS1. Join DISCORD SERVER = 1 Stake2. Posting messages about The Noxal in Others DISCORD SERVER: 1 stakes per approved post3. Submit SS link of your post.4. Maximum 5 post on others DISCORD SERVER Per Week.       GROWTH HACKING CAMPAIGNRULES1. Look for articles and videos on Twitter, Telegram, YouTube, in active blogs for key queries: #IDO #investing #altcoins #PlayandEarn #NFTs #GameFi #TokenSale #investment #Launchpad #PublicSale #Web3 2. Make meaningful comments, mentioning the The Noxal project.3. Continue the comment of the previous person, with the mention of the Noxal project.4. Your comment should flow into the dialogue and continue the person’s thought.5. It is forbidden to make meaningless and unconscious comments, spam.6. Maximum 5 comments per Week!REWARDS1 stake per 1 comment       ARTICLE CAMPAIGNRULES1. Articles should be original and unique with a minimum of 500 words.2. Don't copy website about us section, details and whitepaper and other official staffs. Create your own words.3. Article founds plagiarized will get 0 stakes.4. Only 1 article per person. You can use your own blog website or medium, Steemit.5. Article topic must be about the Project.6. Article must contain 2 images related the project, link to the Website, telegram group.7. You must put your proof of authentication on the bottom of the article.REWARDSHigh Quality: 80 stakesMedium Quality: 40 stakesLow Quality: 20 stakes       YOUTUBE CAMPAIGNRULES1. Video must be original and made only by you.2. Your video must be 3 min long and must be uploaded to Youtube.3. Your video must have 300 views minimum. Or it will be disqualified.4. Only one video per person is allowed.5. Video description must have the website link, telegram group link.6. You must put your proof of authentication on the bottom of the video description.REWARDSHigh Quality: 80 stakesMedium Quality: 40 stakesLow Quality: 20 stakes       Note: I am not a part of the team, I was hired as a bounty manager to manage their bounty. Please join on your own risk, and if you want to invest please do your own research. I did my research too but I can be wrong.
